attributes.action: give an amnesty to all illegal houses occupied in the almanzora valley, almeria. Spain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There have been a lot of so called illegal houses ( Those without so called correct licences or escrituras, and those with the correct licences and escrituras issued by local authorities and of which have been bought or built in good faith believing that when dealing with professional people would be the houses of thier dreams. This has not been the case and many people face court orders, and the threat of thier houses being pulled down.Not only this but also after submitting all thier paperwork and licences to the courts are left waiting for years for a reply from the courts as to the outcome of thier houses and thier lives. They cannot sell or remortgage or move on. Theoretically they are given a life sentence. It is wrong and unjust and something must be done to correct this situation immediately.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
